verses.verse: Then SH'mu'el <WH8050> took <WH3947> <WH8799> a vial <WH6378> of oil <WH8081>, and poured <WH3332> <WH8799> it upon his head <WH7218>, and kissed <WH5401> <WH8799> him, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Is it not because the YY <WH3068> hath anointed <WH4886> <WH8804> thee to be captain <WH5057> over his inheritance <WH5159> ?

When thou art departed <WH3212> <WH8800> from me <WH5978> to day <WH3117>, then thou shalt find <WH4672> <WH8804> two <WH8147> men <WH582> by Rachel's <WH7354> sepulchre <WH6900> in the border <WH1366> of Binyamin <WH1144> at Zelzah <WH6766>; and they will say <WH559> <WH8804> unto thee, The asses <WH860> which thou wentest <WH1980> <WH8804> to seek <WH1245> <WH8763> are found <WH4672> <WH8738>: and, lo, thy father <WH1> hath left <WH5203> <WH8804> the care <WH1697> of the asses <WH860>, and sorroweth <WH1672> <WH8804> for you, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, What shall I do <WH6213> <WH8799> for my son <WH1121> ?

Then shalt thou go on <WH2498> <WH8804> forward <WH1973> from thence, and thou shalt come <WH935> <WH8804> to the plain <WH436> of Tavor <WH8396>, and there shall meet <WH4672> <WH8804> thee three <WH7969> men <WH582> going up <WH5927> <WH8802> to 'Elohim <WH430> to Beit-El <WH1008>, one <WH259> carrying <WH5375> <WH8802> three <WH7969> kids <WH1423>, and another <WH259> carrying <WH5375> <WH8802> three <WH7969> loaves <WH3603> of bread <WH3899>, and another <WH259> carrying <WH5375> <WH8802> a bottle <WH5035> of wine <WH3196>:
And they will <WH7592> <WH8804> salute <WH7965> thee, and give <WH5414> <WH8804> thee two <WH8147> loaves of bread <WH3899>; which thou shalt receive <WH3947> <WH8804> of their hands <WH3027>.

After <WH310> that thou shalt come <WH935> <WH8799> to the hill <WH1389> of 'Elohim <WH430>, where is the garrison <WH5333> of the Philistines <WH6430>: and it shall come to pass, when thou art come thither <WH935> <WH8800> to the city <WH5892>, that thou shalt meet <WH6293> <WH8804> a company <WH2256> of prophets <WH5030> coming down <WH3381> <WH8802> from the high place <WH1116> with a psaltery <WH5035>, and a tabret <WH8596>, and a pipe <WH2485>, and a harp <WH3658>, before <WH6440> them; and they shall prophesy <WH5012> <WH8693>:

And the Spirit <WH7307> of the YY <WH3068> will come <WH6743> <WH8804> upon thee, and thou shalt prophesy <WH5012> <WH8694> with them, and shalt be turned <WH2015> <WH8738> into another <WH312> man <WH376>.
And let it be, when these signs <WH226> are come <WH935> <WH8799> unto thee, that thou do <WH6213> <WH8798> as occasion <WH4672> <WH8799> serve <WH3027> thee; for 'Elohim <WH430> is with thee.

And thou shalt go down <WH3381> <WH8804> before <WH6440> me to Gilgal <WH1537>; and, behold, I will come down <WH3381> <WH8802> unto thee, to offer <WH5927> <WH8687> burnt offerings <WH5930>, and to sacrifice <WH2076> <WH8800> sacrifices <WH2077> of peace offerings <WH8002>: seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> shalt thou tarry <WH3176> <WH8686>, till I come <WH935> <WH8800> to thee, and shew <WH3045> <WH8689> thee what thou shalt do <WH6213> <WH8799>.

And it was so, that when he had turned <WH6437> <WH8687> his back <WH7926> to go <WH3212> <WH8800> from SH'mu'el <WH8050>, 'Elohim <WH430> gave <WH2015> <WH8799> him another <WH312> heart <WH3820>: and all those signs <WH226> came <WH935> <WH8799> to pass that day <WH3117>.

And when they came <WH935> <WH8799> thither to the hill <WH1389>, behold, a company <WH2256> of prophets <WH5030> met <WH7125> <WH8800> him; and the Spirit <WH7307> of 'Elohim <WH430> came <WH6743> <WH8799> upon him, and he prophesied <WH5012> <WH8691> among <WH8432> them.

And it came to pass, when all that knew <WH3045> <WH8802> him beforetime <WH865> <WH8032> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that, behold, he prophesied <WH5012> <WH8738> among the prophets <WH5030>, then the people <WH5971> said <WH559> <WH8799> one <WH376> to another <WH7453>, What is this that is come unto the son <WH1121> of Kish <WH7027>? Is Saul <WH7586> also among the prophets <WH5030> ?

And one <WH376> of the same place answered <WH6030> <WH8799> and said <WH559> <WH8799>, But who is their father <WH1>? Therefore it became a proverb <WH4912>, Is Saul <WH7586> also among the prophets <WH5030> ?
And when he had made an end <WH3615> <WH8762> of prophesying <WH5012> <WH8692>, he came <WH935> <WH8799> to the high place <WH1116>.

And Saul's <WH7586> uncle <WH1730> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him and to his servant <WH5288>, Whither <WH575> went <WH1980> <WH8804> ye? And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, To seek <WH1245> <WH8763> the asses <WH860>: and when we saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that they were no where <WH369>, we came <WH935> <WH8799> to SH'mu'el <WH8050>.
And Saul's <WH7586> uncle <WH1730> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Tell <WH5046> <WH8685> me, I pray thee, what SH'mu'el <WH8050> said <WH559> <WH8804> unto you.

And Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto his uncle <WH1730>, He told <WH5046> <WH8689> us plainly <WH5046> <WH8687> that the asses <WH860> were found <WH4672> <WH8738>. But of the matter <WH1697> of the kingdom <WH4410>, whereof SH'mu'el <WH8050> spake <WH559> <WH8804>, he told <WH5046> <WH8689> him not.
And SH'mu'el <WH8050> called <WH6817> <WH8686> the people <WH5971> together unto the YY <WH3068> to Mizpeh <WH4709>;

And said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, I brought up <WH5927> <WH8689> Yisra'EL <WH3478> out of Egypt <WH4714>, and delivered <WH5337> <WH8686> you out of the hand <WH3027> of the Egyptians <WH4714>, and out of the hand <WH3027> of all kingdoms <WH4467>, and of them that oppressed <WH3905> <WH8801> you:

And ye have this day <WH3117> rejected <WH3988> <WH8804> your 'Elohim <WH430>, who himself saved <WH3467> <WH8688> you out of all your adversities <WH7451> and your tribulations <WH6869>; and ye have said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Nay, but set <WH7760> <WH8799> a king <WH4428> over us. Now therefore present <WH3320> <WH8690> yourselves before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> by your tribes <WH7626>, and by your thousands <WH505>.
And when SH'mu'el <WH8050> had caused all the tribes <WH7626> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> to come near <WH7126> <WH8686>, the tribe <WH7626> of Binyamin <WH1144> was taken <WH3920> <WH8735>.

When he had caused the tribe <WH7626> of Binyamin <WH1144> to come near <WH7126> <WH8686> by their families <WH4940>, the family <WH4940> of Matri <WH4309> was taken <WH3920> <WH8735>, and Saul <WH7586> the son <WH1121> of Kish <WH7027> was taken <WH3920> <WH8735>: and when they sought <WH1245> <WH8762> him, he could not be found <WH4672> <WH8738>.

Therefore they enquired <WH7592> <WH8799> of the YY <WH3068> further, if the man <WH376> should yet come <WH935> <WH8804> thither <WH1988>. And the YY <WH3068> answered <WH559> <WH8799>, Behold, he hath hid <WH2244> <WH8737> himself among the stuff <WH3627>.

And they ran <WH7323> <WH8799> and fetched <WH3947> <WH8799> him thence: and when he stood <WH3320> <WH8691> among <WH8432> the people <WH5971>, he was higher <WH1361> <WH8799> than any of the people <WH5971> from his shoulders <WH7926> and upward <WH4605>.

And SH'mu'el <WH8050> said <WH559> <WH8799> to all the people <WH5971>, See <WH7200> <WH8804> ye him whom the YY <WH3068> hath chosen <WH977> <WH8804>, that there is none like him among all the people <WH5971>? And all the people <WH5971> shouted <WH7321> <WH8686>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, 'Elohim save <WH2421> <WH8799> the king <WH4428>.

Then SH'mu'el <WH8050> told <WH1696> <WH8762> the people <WH5971> the manner <WH4941> of the kingdom <WH4410>, and wrote <WH3789> <WH8799> it in a book <WH5612>, and laid it up <WH3240> <WH8686> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>. And SH'mu'el <WH8050> sent <WH7971> all the people <WH5971> away <WH7971> <WH8762>, every man <WH376> to his house <WH1004>.

And Saul <WH7586> also went <WH1980> <WH8804> home <WH1004> to Giv`ah <WH1390>; and there went <WH3212> <WH8799> with him a band of men <WH2428>, whose hearts <WH3820> 'Elohim <WH430> had touched <WH5060> <WH8804>.

But the children <WH1121> of B'liya'al <WH1100> said <WH559> <WH8804>, How shall this man save <WH3467> <WH8686> us? And they despised <WH959> <WH8799> him, and brought <WH935> <WH8689> him no presents <WH4503>. But he held his peace <WH2790> <WH8688>.
